datastructures

Class MinAreaTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures.ShapeTree
      • datastructures.MinAreaTree
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShapeSearchTree

    public class MinAreaTree
extends ShapeTree
    Binary search tree for shapes in the plane. The shapes are stored in the leafs of the tree. The algorithm for storing a new shape is as following. Starting from the root go to the child, so that the increase of the bounding shape of that child is minimal after adding the new shape, until you reach a leaf. The use of ShapeDirections to calculate the bounding shape is for historical reasons (coming from a Kd-Tree). Instead any algorithm to calculate a bounding shape of two input shapes can be used. The algorithm would of course also work for higher dimensions.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
